text: The men's 10,000 metres walk event at the 1996 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Sydney, Australia, at International Athletic Centre on 22 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Francisco Javier Fernández ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| David Márquez ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Nathan Deakes ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 22 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
